GSMtester class¶

class gsmodutils.test.tester.GSMTester(project)[source]¶

Bases: object

Loads models and executes user specified tests for the genome scale models

gsmodutils.test.tester.stdout_ctx(stdout=None)[source]¶

Context to capture standard output of python executed tests during run time This is displayed to the user for them to see after the tests are run
